## ⚠️ Contribution Policy Notice

Thank you for your interest in contributing to this project!

**Please note:** This repository is currently maintained exclusively by [@DJ2695](https://github.com/DJ2695) and **is not accepting external contributions** at this time.

### What this means:
- ❌ External pull requests will not be reviewed or merged
- ❌ External feature requests will not be considered  
- ❌ External bug reports may not be addressed

### Alternatives:
- ✅ Fork this repository and create your own version
- ✅ Use the code according to the MIT License terms
- ✅ Watch the repository for future policy changes

---

**For Repository Owner:** If this is your PR, please delete this template and proceed with your changes.
